hero.title: Logistics solutions for the Chemical industry
hero.description: We manage hazardous substances and materials with safety, compliance and total traceability.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we offer specialized logistics solutions for the chemical industry. We manage warehousing, transportation and distribution of controlled substances under strict safety and regulatory compliance protocols.

items.title: Specialized Warehousing
items.description: Facilities with segregated areas, controlled ventilation and compliance with national and international regulations for chemical substances.

items.title: Safe Transportation
items.description: Planned routes and vehicles enabled for controlled substance and hazardous material transportation with GPS monitoring.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Repackaging, regulatory labeling, industrial kitting and product reconditioning with strict batch control.

items.title: Document Management
items.description: Comprehensive control of permits, safety data sheets (MSDS) and transportation documentation to prevent contingencies.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Comprehensive import and export coordination under specific chemical, environmental and customs regulations.

benefits.title: Safety, compliance and total control
items: Regulatory compliance throughout the supply chain.
Total traceability by batch, product and location.
Optimized logistics costs and delivery times.

items.title: Chemical distribution
items.fullDesc: Safe and monitored transportation of supplies to industrial plants.

items.title: Segregated storage
items.fullDesc: Differentiated areas by substance type and chemical compatibility.

items.title: Regulatory relabeling
items.fullDesc: Label adaptation according to destination country or end client.

items.title: Technical kitting
items.fullDesc: Chemical product preparation for laboratories or industrial processes.

items.title: Import management
items.fullDesc: Coordination of controlled substances and chemical raw materials.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications and HSE protocols that guarantee safety in every operation.
